articles.content:
Jurgen Klopp has bizarrely had his coaching acumen called into question by former referee Keith Hackett, who claimed a recent Sadio Mane issue can be easily remedied.

articles.title: Leeds 'overtake Barcelona' in striker race as €20m move edges closer - TEAMtalk
articles.description: Leeds United are now the frontrunners to sign a 25-goal Brazilian striker also wanted by Barcelona, according to reports.
articles.content:
Leeds United are now the frontrunners to land FC Basel striker Arthur Cabral, according to reports.
